title: Upgrade ref guide for Json Query DSL
description: Json Query DSL needs to be added into ref guide.

comments.content:
Patch for this ticket, including documentation for

	Bool qparser
	Json Request API
	Json Query DSL



Hi Cassandra Targett, please review this patch.
comments.author: Cao Manh Dat

comments.content:
I've attached a new patch after review where I've made several edits - mostly copy editing for proper placement of articles, capitalizing section titles and other words where necessary, monospacing parameter names, etc.

The addition of the parameter mapping table is a good addition to the JSON Request API docs - it was the biggest thing I thought was missing.

I think this is OK to go - I think it will need some more fleshing out in the future, but let's see what sorts of questions come up from users about it.
comments.author: Cassandra Targett

comments.content: Thank Cassandra Targett, I will commit now.
